column4: Just a slightly off the wall question, are both the desktop & netbook using ubuntu? I only ask because I've had machines with windows thats wouldn't pick up certain routers because they were broadcasting on a channel that windows/wifi driver wouldn't accept in the uk
yes the two pcs have ubuntu 10.10
No worries, I just thought it was worth mentioning as a "just in case idea"
Sorry, I have no idea either
